attributes.action: Do not ban trail hunting and hunting in general. There is no need to!
attributes.additional_details: I have been to my fair few trail hunts and the only thing that gets injuries is some bushes. It brings back tradition and history and its people’s lives and hobbies. Let people have their opinions but you shouldn’t ban in. Labour don’t really have a great track record with farmers and this will make it 100x worse. You aren’t for the people and this just shows it. There is no problem or danger in the hunt aswell as you almost always have aunties ther to ‘try stop you’.
attributes.background: Trail hunting especially is packed full of tradition and brings together people from all different backgrounds. It’s brings the community of equine, agricultural and hounds. There is no apparent reason why you have chose to do this now. All your doing is making yourself more hated and more protests

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Stop the ban on trail hunting" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755123
